name: Slime Adventures Demo
description:
Emil wakes up one day on a cold stone floor. Who is he? What is he? Where does he come from? All he knows is that a portal is shining above him. Let’s see where it goes!

Slime Adventures is a rogue-like platformer we made while waiting around to graduate from engineering school. We wanted to make a game that would be just hard and skill-intensive enough to feel good about ourselves when we beat it, inspired largely by other awesome games like Hollow Knight and Dead Cells.

There's only one stage at the moment, but if you guys like the game we'll roll out more levels in the future while fine-tuning the gameplay. There's still a bunch of ideas we'd like to try. Let us know what you think about it! (Even if you hated it; negative criticism > silence, haha) We'd love to hear more feedback on how we can make our game better. You can reach us at adventures.of.a.slime@gmail.com, or just comment on the page!

We'll upload the build for macOS soon.
